hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Map of the Water Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Bridge

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #3# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #0# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Entrance Front Left Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Forest Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Barinade#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of time.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Space, space, wanna go to space, yes, please space. Space space. Go to space.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Map of the Fire Temple# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Nayru's Love#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say you can cut corners to get to your destination faster.
